title: 服务端崩溃
author: RF_huixue
txt_content:
应该是加了什么mod的原因，但是看不太懂崩溃记录，求大佬来帮忙看一看，谢谢了








mc.txt


2019-6-20 16:27 上传

崩溃记录

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
UCE        DurabilityShow{1.2.0} [Durability Show] (Durability+Show-1.2.0[1.7.10].jar) 
        UCE        Neat{GRADLE:VERSION-GRADLE:BUILD} [Neat] (Neat 1.0-1.jar) 
删除[ruby=Durability Show]耐久显示[/ruby]和[ruby=Neat]血量显示[/ruby]，这是客户端模组，不要加到服务端

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 上传此文件 D:\mc\fuwduan\官服服务端【1.7.10-1.13.2】\1.7.10\KCauldron-1.7.10-1614.201-bundle\.\crash-reports\crash-2019-06-20_16.23.33-server.txt

replies.txt_content:
